title: I'm STEALING this! - Nebula Cosmos Laser 4K Projector
description: Thanks to Nebula for sponsoring today's video! Grab yourself a Nebula Cosmos Laser 4K projector at   Projectors are an interesting category as they typically aren't exactly portable, but offer screen sizes way beyond a typical display. Nebula has been changing that and their new Cosmos Laser  4K projector might be defining the space.   Buy Xbox Series X On Amazon:  On Best Buy:  On Newegg:   Buy HDMI Cables On Amazon:  On Best Buy:  On Newegg:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  GET MERCH:  SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:    LTX EXPO:      AFFILIATES & REFERRALS --------------------------------------------------- Affiliates, Sponsors & Referrals:  Check out our podcast gear:  Private Internet Access VPN:  Our Official Charging Partner Anker:  Secretlabs Gaming Chairs:  MK Keyboards:  Nerd or Die Stream Overlays:  Green Man Gaming  Amazon Prime:  Audible Free Trial:  Our Gear on Amazon:    FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:     FOLLOW OUR OTHER CHANNELS ---------------------------------------------------   Linus Tech Tips:  TechLinked:  Mac Address:  Techquickie:    LMG Clips:  Channel Super Fun:  Carpool Critics:   CHAPTERS ---------------------------------------------------   0:00 - Lasers! 0:27 - Unboxing and overview 0:56 - Exterior impressions 1:30 - 4K Streaming Dongle 2:00 - Unboxing continued 2:44 - Portability impressions 3:11 - Projector setup and settings 6:10 - Movie impressions 7:55 - Jono's oopsie 8:20 - Gaming impressions 8:44 - Final thoughts
